mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Sku ( commodityId, spec, total, createBy, updateBy, createTime, updateTime) VALUES ( #{commodityId}, #{spec}, #{total}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, (SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000), (SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000));
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: SELECT t1.commodityId, t1.spec, t1.total, t2.buys FROM Sku t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(total) AS buys,commodityId, info FROM `Order` WHERE status != 5 GROUP BY commodityId, info ) t2 ON t2.commodityId = t1.commodityId AND t2.info = t1.spec LEFT JOIN Commodity t3 ON t3.id = t1.commodityId WHERE t3.isActive = 1 AND t1.commodityId = #{commodityId}
